DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether multiple dos darunavir/ritonavir lopinavir/ritonavir affect pharmacokinetics daclatasvir healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assessing Effects Darunavir/Ritonavir Lopinavir/Ritonavir Pharmacokinetics Daclatasvir Healthy Participants
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Key Healthy male female participant , age 18 49 , determine medical history , physical examination , 12 lead electrocardiogram , vital sign , clinical laboratory evaluation Key Any significant acute chronic medical illness ; donation blood blood bank clinical study ( except screen visit ) within 4 week study drug administration ( within 2 week plasma ) ; blood screen finding positive hepatitis C antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , HIV1 HIV2 antibody
